column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was by far one of the best experiences of my life
column2: along with the Smithsonian. I was at a conference and I scheduled everything around my visit to the Art Institute of Chicago. My strategy to visit Millennium Park and just about every inch of the museum worked out
column3: in record time. The Picassos were the biggest treat for me and I really had to peel myself away from The Old Guitarist
column4: so I could be sure to cram it all in. From the armor to the Native American exhibit
